1: pa'i//lho <mistake>lhas</mistake> dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid//sgra yig <mistake>ai</mistake> dang ldan pa <mistake>yi//byarg</mistake> las dang po 'gyur bar bya//dbus las dang po de bzhin du//thig le yang dag
2: ldan pa'o//zhes <mistake>pcom</mistake> ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin <mistake>du //thig</mistake> <mistake>lenga</mistake> ro yang dag ldan//dbus las <mistake>tham</mistake> bzung ba <mistake>dang//yi</mistake> ge a dang <mistake>lhan</mistake> pa
3: <mistake>yi/rlung</mistake> mtshams phyi rol gnas par 'gyur//me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid//byang las dang po yang yin te//dbus las dbu ma pa yang <mistake>bzung//e</mistake> yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i//
4: lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung <mistake>nas//tshig</mistake> drag <mistake>a</mistake> yig sbyor bas so//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba <mistake>cshen</mistake> po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig
5: thig le dang ldan pa'i//dbus las dbu ma yang yin te//me mtshams 'dab <mistake>mcan</mistake> ldan pa'i//dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba'o//o yig dang ni ldan pa yi//bden bral 'dab mar gnas
6: de <mistake>bzhin//lhols</mistake> dang po de bzhin du//yi ge <mistake>ai</mistake> <mistake>yigldan</mistake> pa yi//byang las tha ma yang <mistake>yinte//dbang</mistake> ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la//zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal//zhes bcom ldan
7: <mistake>'ds</mistake> dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs <mistake>so///me</mistake> mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la//zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal//dbus las tha <mistake>m</mistake> yang de <mistake>bzhim/</mistake>
8: sgra yig a dang <mistake>spyor</mistake> ba <mistake>yi //rlung</mistake> mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te//dbang ldan phyi rol gnas nyid la//me mtshams stan dang ldan <mistake>p</mistake> <mistake>ste //spra</mistake> yig o dang sbyor bar bya//bzhi <mistake>bar</mistake> yongs su grags pa
